sqlMap.insert: insert into users(user_id, user_nickname, user_password, user_name, user_tel, user_birth, user_theme, user_sign_date, class_id) values (#user_id#, #user_nickname#, #user_password#, #user_name#, #user_tel#, #user_birth#, 0, sysdate, #class_id#)
insert into email_check (email_chk_no, email_chk_date, email_chk_cont, email_chk_addr) values (email_chk_no_seq.nextval, sysdate, #code#, #mail#)
sqlMap.select: select * from (select email_chk_cont as code from email_check where email_chk_addr = #mail# order by email_chk_no desc) where rownum = 1
sqlMap.insert: insert into terms_his (terms_no, user_id, terms_agree) values (#terms_no#, #terms_title#, 1)
sqlMap.select: select class_id, class_title ||' '|| class_num ||' - '|| class_room as classname from class where class_id != 'C000' and sysdate < class_end
